alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chemung; Chenango; Delaware; Otsego; Steuben; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 4:42AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...AN AREA OF SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF OTSEGO...STEUBEN... CHEMUNG...CHENANGO...TIOGA...BROOME...DELAWARE...SUSQUEHANNA...AND BRADFORD COUNTIES... HAZARDS...An area of snow accompanied by winds of 20 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. Snow accumulations up to 1 inch will cause untreated roads and surface to become snow covered and slick early this morning. Plan some extra time to reach your destination safely. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 439 AM EST, an area of moderate snow was along a line extending from near Worcester to Oneonta to near Sidney to Newark Valley to Breesport to near South Corning and moving south at 10 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Chemung, Binghamton, Elmira, Vestal, Johnson City, Oneonta, Endicott, Corning, Southport, and Barton. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 1 and 8. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 42 and 84. Interstate 88 between 1 and 19. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 near 230. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Broome; Chemung; Chenango; Delaware; Otsego; Steuben; Tioga
